summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Holgate Street in the City of Seattle, from 17th Avenue South to 31st Avenue South, by grading and curbing the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 339 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
